p: The results of biochemical indicators of liver and kidney function are summarized in Tables 3, 4 and 5. The administration of CCl 4 caused severe hepato and reno-toxicity in the treated rats, as evidenced by the significant elevations of serum ALT, AST, ALP, LDH, γGT, total cholesterol, triglycerides, LDL urea and creatinine levels, while HDL level was decreased compared to control animals.
